title: Zookeepr: Home-grown conference management software
summary:
Zookeepr [http://zookeepr.org/] is a comprehensive web-based conference
management system, written in Python and built on Pylons. It has an
unusual development history: custom created for the annual Linux.conf.au
conference, there are yearly spikes in event-focused feature
development, but relatively little of the ongoing development typically
seen in open source projects.
